body:
I met the same problem when constructing the graph differently in different mode.
Could you please try:
```
with tf.variable_scope('output') as output_scope:
  self._output_layer = _core_layers.Dense(self._vocab_size, name='output_layer', _scope=output_scope,)
```
It will fix the scope.
